ABOUT

Hello! Nice to see you here!

I am a UX specialist and former project manager, actually based in Poznan, Poland.
I’m devoted to problem-solving and I believe well-thought projects focused on users make good business results.

I am highly focused on self-development, continuously expanding my knowledge in various fields related to UX.

In private I am interested in psychology, especially the way people make decisions. To expand my knowledge of the human mind, I graduated with a Master's degree in cognitive science.

When I’am not analyzing users' needs or designing UX you can find me wearing my headphones and listening to music. On sunny days you can also find me somewhere around the trees.

VIEW MY RESUME

TESTIMONIALS

I worked with Agnieszka on several, web and mobile, projects. She is a very diligent and detail-oriented person. She uses her UX background combined with her current Project Management skills to push projects forward with great ease. Her outstanding empathy together with the analytical approach work magic. Definitely has a potential for a UX-related positions. She is a fast-learner and often exceeds expectations of her fellow team members. Working with Agnieszka is a real pleasure.

Mateusz Krawczynski
CEO at UX Dream

Let’s create something together!
